unnormalised: Interesting transfers! Will Gokulam Kerala FC manage with their recent signings? Reminds me of "Chak De! India" – a real underdog story. East Bengal needs a strong defender after losing Sandesh Jhingan. Rs. 2 Crore for that midfielder seems steep. Can he justify the expense like a Kapil Dev performance? Mohun Bagan's new striker from Mumbai City FC has a lot to prove, playing for such a legacy club. Lots of kilometers to cover this season!
